Ibu Meryati yang terhormat, 
Salam hangat dari Ibis Pontianak,
Pertama-tama, kami berterima kasih atas kedatangan Ibu ke hotel kami – Ibis Pontianak – beberapa waktu yang lalu. 
Terima kasih atas kesediaan Ibu untuk memberikan ulasan terkait pengalaman Ibu selama berada di hotel kami. 
Kami menerima dengan baik komentar yang Ibu sampaikan, meskipun tampak sekali kekecewaan yang Ibu rasakan. 
Kami merasa menyesal sekali mengetahui tim kami tidak dapat memberikan pelayanan prima dan maksimal selama Ibu menginap di hotel kami. Kami atas nama Manajemen Ibis Pontianak meminta maaf atas pelayanan kami yang mengecewakan Ibu. Kami telah memberikan teguran keras kepada staff kami yang bertugas agar dapat memperbaiki pelayanan kepada setiap tamu. Kami akan terus berupaya melakukan usaha pengingkatan kualitas pelayanan tim kami ke depannya. Kami pastikan kejadian-kejadian serupa tidak akan terulang kembali di masa yang akan datang. 
Demikian yang dapat kami sampaikan. Besar harapan kami untuk berkesempatan memberikan pelayanan yang lebih baik lagi pada kedatangan Ibu berikutnya. 
Terima kasih dan Semoga hari Ibu selalu menyenangkan. 
Salam,
Riganda Togatorop
General Manager

text:
Jujur saya baru pertama kali staycation di hotel Ibis Pontianak. Fasilitas dari hotel ataupun kamarnya cukup lengkap, lalu suasana kamar kekinian dan unik (terutama toiletnya) dan lokasi super strategis. Tidak hanya itu, breakfast disana banyak pilihan sampai bingung mau makan apa.
Yang bikin saya suka staycation disana adalah kita bisa isi ulang air botol minum dari hotel berkali2 meskipun harus keluar kamar dan pelayanan sangat bagus dan responsif. Saya jadikan hotel ini sebagai tujuan staycation bila sudah waktunya liburan di dalam kota, moga hotel ini mempertahankan pelayanan bagi wisatawan yang datang untuk menginap 🙏

Hai pontianak, kota yg selalu menggugah selera kuliner bnyk org yg datang, tapi untuk itu perlu temper istirahat yg nyaman, saya memilih ibis selama 7 hari menginap di pontianak, selain hotel nya strategis, keramahan semua staf dan manajemen ibis membuat betah...hanya perlu sedikit catatan untuk kuliner pagi alias sarapan paginya menurut gue membosankan maka kadang setiap pagi malas sarapan klo nga laper banget krn dgn mengusunh cita rasa nusantara menu kurang menarik dan rasanya biasa aja jadi nga pengen nambah, pagi itu gue lapar mau sarapan ada menu perkedel jagung pas dimakan isinya kebnykan tepung jagung nya 4 butir, padahal menurut gue jagungnya harus di halus kan biar nyatu jadi deh perkedek enak, semoga kedepan nya ibis makin berinovasi. Dan terus memberikan kenyaman buat semua tamu serasa rumah sendiri...untuk hotel ibis pontianak jago nya ...rekomendasi hotel di tengah kota

text:
hotel yg sangat representative untuk rapat" kedinasan.  Pelayanan yang sangat memuaskan,  mulai dari persiapan acara,  saat acara berlangsung sampai selesai acara.  
Ruang rapatnya nyaman,  pengaturan kursi tidak di paksakan, kami di beri 2 ruangan, padahal peserta hanya 40 an,  yang satu ruangan saja sebenarnya cukup.  namun demi kenyamanan peserta kami di beri 2 ruangan (sekatnya di buka),  sehingga peserta leluasa.  
Kamarnya nya wangi,  rapi dan bersih. wc di tempat acara sangat bersih,  kering n wangi.  
Permintaan" kami sangat banyak,  semua nya diakomodir oleh pihak hotel tanpa ada satupun yang terlewatkan. 
Jika ad permasalahan or permintaan kami yang mendadak,  staf" hotel dengan sigap dan cepat mengakomodirnya. 
Makannya enak dan pilihannya dessert nya banyak (aneka macam buah, cake,  es buah,  puding) 
Lokasinya di tengah" kota membuat peserta dari Kabupaten mudah untuk mengaksesnya dan yg penting harga terjangkau😊😊.
 Terima kasih Mb Leni,  Terima kasih mas Agung/Agus (lupa namanya 😊😊)

text:
Overall bagus selama 5 hari saya disini dri, tanggal 25-30 maret,,,mulai dari pelayanan cek in yg ramah dan cepet,kamar yg bersih,helpfully staff,sarapan yg enak dan hotel berada di tempat strategis. 
tpi ad 1 hal yg harus di perbaiki oleh hotel yaitu pelayanan transportasi,di sni para tamu hotel yg ingin menggunakan taxi online dilarang oleh oknum petugas taxi offline yg bekerjasama dengan hotel ibis
Para oknum tsb tidak lgsg melarang tamu hotel
Tetapi lebih ke melarang/mengintimidasi driver taxi online untuk tidak menjemput tamu di hotel ibis
Jadi setiap kali tamu ad yg memesan taxi online,driver taxi online tidak berani masuk ke area hotel/lobby hotel.
Jadi terpaksa tamu harus berjalan keluar ke depan deket taman budaya maupun museum kalbar buat naik taxi online.
Untuk masalah transportasi ini pihak manapun tidak bisa melarang tamu hotel ingin menggunakan apa dan dengan apa
Sekian masukan dari saya
Semoga di saat saya kembali sudah ada perubahan utk masalah transportasi ini
Terimakasih

text:
We have been staying in this hotel for the last 17 days with the intention of extending our stay for another 5-6 days. However, there are some negative aspects of this hotel that we would like to highlight. Firstly, the business center has provided little support as they do not have glue or clear tape available.

Secondly, we were charged 5,000 rupiah per page for printing, which is quite expensive, especially since we are long-term guests. Other hotels would usually offer complimentary printing for 5-6 pages for guests staying for a longer period.

Thirdly, prayer mats are not provided in the room, which may be inconvenient for some guests. Lastly, even if you stay for a longer period, do not expect a complimentary upgrade as other hotels may offer. This is because you need to book directly with the hotel or take their annual paid membership to be eligible for such perks.

Therefore, if you are a longer staying guest visiting for business, we do not recommend this hotel, even though it is located in the city center.
title: Not for Business Travellers

text:
Our stay was amazing. Started from the beginning, we got help for our luggages. Staffs were friendly and ready to help. We keep our baby foods in the freezer safely and got help every time we need to take the foods one by one. Room was clean, housekeeping gave a great service. Breakfast were tasty. There were many choices from rice, buffet, salad bar, western breakfast, cereal, traditional cuisines, and mostly were good enough.
Sadly we stayed on the 9th floor, which just above the smoking floor. After we left the room and turned the elctricity off, we smell smoke from the shower's exhaust. Hope it can be treated so other guests won't be disturbed by the smell.
Staffs were outstanding. Maybe just a little more attentive will do. We were offered for air freshner and asked for cotton bud, but both didn't come.
But our stay was really enjoyable. Thank you for the hospitality. Am loving the view from the window of our room.
title: Helpful staffs, comfy stay.

text: I stayed at Ibis hotel pontianak when i had a reunion last march 2019. I was the committee. The room was good. Not expensive. Clean. Staff was helpfull. And the breakfast, two thumbs up!! For the reunion, we used the ballroom as the participants were almost 200. It was a good choice. The ballroom provided 'a gala feeling' yet, really intimate. The ceiling was high so that the room gave a sense of spacefull. So yesterday,with my recommendation as a committee, again, we held a like a reunion event, across alumni. There were 180 participants. We used an Event Organizer. Everybody said that the food was good. And the party, was like 'an award party' type as the room really accomadated the EO's plan....ibis hotel pontianak? Recommended!!
title: Fantastic!

Dear Mr Andyrizky

Warmest greeting from Ibis Pontianak City Center,

Thank you very much for taking some of your precious time to complete your review of our hotel on Trip Advisor. It is a real pleasure to have welcome you back.

I have taken notes of the displeasing experiences you have encountered during your last visit.

I have immediately addressed the element of your experience with the concerned Department Heads for immediate improvements. 

I sincerely apologize for the shortfalls you have encountered, and please rest assured that we have taken the necessary steps to increase our service values.

At Ibis Pontianak City Center, it is our aim to always provide an exceptional experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us.

Thank you once again for your review and I hope this would not prevent us to welcoming you back at our hotel on your next visit to Pontianak.

With best regards,
Samian Rais

text: Nice new hotel, clean rooms, quiet neighbourhood.  We asked for a non-smoking room and were put in a non-smoking floor.  However they put smoking guests on that floor and the smoke that came through the ventilation system was unbearble!  No amount of 'informing' the Front Desk did anything to resolve the situation.  Apologies are not enough.  They need to take action!
title: New hotel

text:
Check in was slow and inefficient. Budget hotel with basic amenities so best to bring your own. 

My bedding was dirty with stains and had to be changed though housekeeping was friendly. 

The shower area drainage was not good. It took a while for the water to drain during and after shower. 

Access to the hotel was blocked on car free Sunday morning so it was a hassle to get in and out of the hotel. 

Ibis is a relatively new hotel but is starting to look old. 

The hotel was good for 1 night stay and is probably 1 of the better options in Pontianak. Will have rated the hotel higher if not for the aforementioned issues.
title: Budget hotel

text: This appears to be a near-new Ibis hotel, and the rooms feature the same interiors and design as Ibis hotels elsewhere in the world, although the rooms are somewhat more spacious than those in Ibis hotels in Europe. The bathroom for example uses the same prefab module that is also deployed in Ibis hotels in Europe. As Pontianak has few tourists, the hotel appeared to be occupied mostly by people from the region, for example there was a wedding party with many guests staying there, and what appeared to be groups of teenage school kids and/or sports teams. Plus various extended families with kids. Staff were very friendly and helpful, with fast check-in and check-out. A special shout-out to Meisy at reception, who was very helpful and caring as well as efficient, which contributed greatly to the overall experience of my stay at this hotel. Overall the experience was excellent, however I was booked in a room next to some teenagers who appeared to have their friends in the room too and were laughing and talking loudly until the early morning hours, which was audible in my room (not too much, but still could clearly distinguish the sounds). This was a minor annoyance (I could not be bothered to ask to change rooms, as it would have been too much hassle). Recommended!
title: A good stay at a typical Ibis hotel

text:
I stayed there for 6 nights. I chose the hotel because it is a quite new hotel in Pontianak and I know that Ibis and other Accorhotels have good reputation. Overall I really enjoyed my stay there. The room was the standard room of Ibis of course which I always like it. The most important thing is room was clean and new including the bed sheet and towel (loooveee it). The wifi was also good!! 
The front desk staffs, F&B staffs, security were amazing, kind and helpful!
Food was pretty good, I like the freshness of the food during breakfast. I ordered roasted chicken with sambal mattah, twice.. like it! A lil bit disappointed with the cakes that I bought at the hotel lobby, taste was so-so.
title: Very Good!

text: Pleasant staff, who speak some English. Generous buffet breakfast with some tasty food options. Rooms OK but all smell a bit stale, it seems cigarette smoke is recycling through the air-conditioning system (the atale smoke smell was particularity strong in bathroom) Most importantly this hotel is about 3km from the river/centre, located on a busy road with no sidewalk, which means you need a car/taxi to explore Pontianak. (There's a shopping centre about 10 minutes walk away with some restaurants)
title: Reasonable hotel, car needed to access city centre
